pengusecurity.encrypt

Class PenguKeyPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengusecurity.encrypt.PenguKeyPair

  • public class PenguKeyPair
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Allows for the generation of RSA (public and private) key pairs, encryption and decryption using the RSA key pairs, and the exporting and importing of RSA key pairs as Base64 Strings

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int KEY_LENGTH
      Stores the RSA key length constant.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PenguKeyPair()
      Default constructor method, also generates a new RSA key pair.
      PenguKeyPair(java.lang.String privateKey)
      Parameterized constructor method that receives a Base64 encoded RSA private key String.
      PenguKeyPair(java.lang.String key, boolean usePublicKey)
      Parameterized constructor method that receives a Base64 encoded RSA private or public key String.
      PenguKeyPair(java.lang.String privateKey, java.lang.String publicKey)
      Parameterized constructor method that receives two Base64 encoded Strings - the public key String and the private key String.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decryptMessage(java.lang.String encrypted)
      Decrypts an inputed Base64 encoded and encrypted String using RSA.
      java.lang.String encryptMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Encrypts an inputed message String using RSA.
      java.lang.String privateKeyToString()
      Converts the private key into a Base64 encoded String, to be used for exporting the private key.
      java.lang.String publicKeyToString()
      Converts the public key into a Base64 encoded String, to be used for exporting the public key.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • KEY_LENGTH

        public static final int KEY_LENGTH
        Stores the RSA key length constant.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PenguKeyPair

        public PenguKeyPair()
             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Default constructor method, also generates a new RSA key pair.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • PenguKeyPair

        public PenguKeyPair(java.lang.String privateKey)
             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                    java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Parameterized constructor method that receives a Base64 encoded RSA private key String. It is to be used when data will only be encrypted.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The Base64 encoded private key String.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

      • PenguKeyPair

        public PenguKeyPair(java.lang.String key,
                    boolean usePublicKey)
             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                    java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Parameterized constructor method that receives a Base64 encoded RSA private or public key String. It the type of key to be used is determined by a boolean: TRUE - public key (decryption only), FALSE - private key (encryption only).
        Parameters:
        key - The Base64 encoded public or private key String.
        usePublicKey - The boolean indicator that specifies which key will be used. TRUE - public key (decryption only), FALSE - private key (encryption only).
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

      • PenguKeyPair

        public PenguKeyPair(java.lang.String privateKey,
                    java.lang.String publicKey)
             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                    java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Parameterized constructor method that receives two Base64 encoded Strings - the public key String and the private key String. It is to be used when both the encryption of data and decryption of data is required.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The Base64 encoded private key String.
        publicKey - The Base64 encoded public key String.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException

    • Method Detail

      • encryptMessage

        public java.lang.String encryptMessage(java.lang.String message)
                                throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                       javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                       java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                       javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                       javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Encrypts an inputed message String using RSA.
        Parameters:
        message - The message String to be encrypted.
        Returns:
        Returns a Base64 encoded and encrypted String of the message String.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • decryptMessage

        public java.lang.String decryptMessage(java.lang.String encrypted)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypts an inputed Base64 encoded and encrypted String using RSA.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - The Base64 encoded and encrypted String.
        Returns:
        Returns a String of the decrypted message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • publicKeyToString

        public java.lang.String publicKeyToString()
        Converts the public key into a Base64 encoded String, to be used for exporting the public key.
        Returns:
        Returns a Base64 encoded String of the public key.

      • privateKeyToString

        public java.lang.String privateKeyToString()
        Converts the private key into a Base64 encoded String, to be used for exporting the private key.
        Returns:
        Returns a Base64 encoded String of the private key.
